title: BBC Sound of 2021 longlist includes Griff, Girl In Red and Greentea Peng
description: They rising musicians are among 10 acts tipped for success on the annual BBC talent list.

title: 'I had goosebumps... it was perfect' - Klopp emotional as fans return to Anfield
description: It was an emotional night at Anfield on Sunday as Liverpool welcomed back fans for the first time since becoming Premier League champions.

title: 'Totally disrespectful' - angry Jones fires back at criticism of England's style
description: Eddie Jones calls criticism of England's style of play "totally disrespectful" after his side beat France 22-19 in extra-time to win the Autumn Nations Cup at Twickenham.

title: Which player is tailor-made for Mourinho - and is in Garth Crooks' team of the week?
description: Who is "irritating beyond belief"? Which player is tailor-made for Jose Mourinho? Find out in Garth Crooks' team of the week and then pick your own.

title: Why snowy UK winters could become thing of the past
description: By the 2040s most of southern England may no longer get sub-zero days, new Met Office data suggests.

title: Brexit: 'Deal to be done' as UK-EU trade talks resume
description: The government says "sticking points" can be overcome, but the EU must "respect UK sovereignty".

title: Covid-19: 'No Brexit impact' on vaccine rollout
description: The medicines regulator says the UK is "ready" for "any outcome", as talks on a UK-EU deal continue.

title: Peter Alliss: Legendary BBC golf commentator dies at 89
description: Peter Alliss, the legendary BBC golf commentator, dies at the age of 89.

title: Millwall 'dismayed and saddened' by fans' booing of players taking a knee
description: Millwall say they are "dismayed and saddened" after some of their fans booed players taking a knee at the start of Saturday's game against Derby.

title: Peter Alliss: Gary Lineker & Ken Brown on legendary BBC golf commentator
description: Gary Lineker, Hazel Irvine and Ken Brown pay tribute to the legendary BBC golf commentator Peter Alliss, who has died at the age of 89.

title: Coronavirus: NHS to begin vaccine rollout this week
description: Health Secretary Matt Hancock says the start of the vaccination scheme is "a historic moment".

title: Hayabusa-2: Capsule with asteroid samples in 'perfect' shape
description: A team retrieves a capsule carrying the first significant quantities of rock from an asteroid.

title: Why Fnatic is giving fans a chance to part-own the team
description: Newsbeat talks to Fnatic boss Sam Mathews about opening the team up to be part-owned by fans

title: South Africa v England: Tour party return two 'unconfirmed positive' Covid tests
description: England players are self-isolating after two unnamed members of the tour party in South Africa return "unconfirmed positive tests" for coronavirus.

title: Trump campaigns in Georgia amid crucial Senate race
description: The US president holds a campaign rally in Georgia where two run-offs will determine control of the US Senate.

title: Coronavirus: How lockdown interrupted wedding plans
description: One bride, one groom, a wedding ceremony and a reception - what could go wrong?

title: Newspaper headlines: 'Cabinet backs PM over no-deal Brexit'
description: Several papers report Boris Johnson has given a Brexit trade deal a "final throw of the dice".

title: What will happen to closed High Street shops?
description: As retail chains fade, town centres may have to find other ways to attract custom.

title: Climate change: Lower Thames Crossing CO2 impact figures revealed
description: Campaigners accuse Boris Johnson of mocking his own promises on climate change and emissions.

title: Covid test-and-trace: Is backwards contact tracing the way forward?
description: How turning back the clock with contact tracing can stop coronavirus superspreading events.

title: Coronavirus: How did your lockdown container garden grow?
description: Growing veg in tiny spaces was a lockdown craze but did you produce bumper crops or snacks for snails?

title: Maradona: Why the football icon's inheritance could be messy
description: Lawyers expect a process fraught with family rows, DNA tests and opportunistic claims.

title: How a lockdown 'sex party' doomed a Hungarian Euro MP
description: It was not just breaching Covid rules that did for Hungarian Jozsef Szajer but claims of hypocrisy too.

title: Alex Wheatle: Why the 'amazingly exciting' Chester Himes should be better known
description: Himes' stories of crime, racism and poverty remain relevant 60 years on, says novelist Alex Wheatle.

title: Noor Hossain and the image that helped bring down a dictator
description: A search for the story behind a picture of Noor Hossain, whose killing helped inspire an uprising.

title: Match of the Day: How Bruno Fernandes & Marcus Rashford transformed Man Utd at West Ham
description: Match of the Day pundit Tim Cahill analyses the impact substitutes Bruno Fernandes and Marcus Rashford had on Manchester United as they scored three second-half goals to beat West Ham.

title: Couple divided for nine months by Covid and an ocean
description: A special pass for long-distance couples allowed Tina and Victor to reunite after nine months on different sides of the world.

title: 'Grow up, mask up': Tensions in Covid hotspot
description: One in 800 North Dakotans has died from Covid, but people are split on how seriously to take it.

title: National Trust volunteer: 'He can do things they said he would never do'
description: James Drury, a volunteer on the Longshaw Estate, has no speech and communicates through photographs.

title: 'Proud to be different, proud to stand out'
description: A video of an incident in which a Sikh boy was kicked and punched outside his school in Telford has sparked an outpouring of messages of support.
